pages.text: $(bgreen)Blover$(), when he was five he got a shiny new birthday cake, made his wish, huffed and puffed, but was able to extinguish only 60% of the candles. Instead of giving up, though, he's used that early defeat as a catalyst to push himself harder ever since.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)50$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(bred)instant-kill$() plant that can damage and blow away all $(l)flying enemies$() in 30 blocks.
$(bpurple)Special :$() It can $(bred)dispel the fog$() for near by players. $(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() Not Avaiable.
